name: APIContractSecurityAudit
description: Security Audit discovers your OpenAPI files, and checks and scores them for well-formedness and security.
author: 42Crunch

inputs.name: apiToken
inputs.label: Enter the API token to access 42Crunch Platform
inputs.helpMarkDown: Add a variable with this name to the variables of your pipeline, and set the value to the API token you created in 42Crunch Platform. [More information](https://docs.42crunch.com/latest/content/tasks/integrate_azure_pipelines.htm

inputs.name: collectionName
inputs.label: Enter a name for the API collection
inputs.helpMarkDown: The API collection where the discovered OpenAPI files are stored. If the specified collection does not exist, it is created. If the specified collection already exists, the APIs in it are removed and replaced with the discovered ones. [More information](https://docs.42crunch.com/latest/content/tasks/integrate_azure_pipelines.htm)

inputs.name: minScore
inputs.label: Minimum score for OpenAPI files
inputs.helpMarkDown: The minimum API score that the found APIs must get in the audit. If any of the APIs scores lower than the minimum you set, the whole task fails. [More information](https://docs.42crunch.com/latest/content/tasks/integrate_azure_pipelines.htm)
